name: Be Somebody
wikiSummary: From the band's fourth album "ONLY BY THE NIGHT", which continues their southern-rock influenced rooted grooves, "BE SOMEBODY" is a lower,  more haunted track on the generally well mixed collection of songs on the album. That it makes The Killers on of the best young indie bands.
wikiText:
From the band's fourth album "ONLY BY THE NIGHT", which continues their southern-rock influenced rooted grooves, "BE SOMEBODY" is a lower,  more haunted track on the generally well mixed collection of songs on the album. That it makes The Killers on of the best young indie bands.
